item.title: Blackstone Secured Lending Fund 10-K
item.description: Blackstone Secured Lending Fund, which is in the Missing_from_sec_filing_header [None] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 27, 2023 had 86830 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1791 instances may - 1193 instances investment - 1184 instances blackstone - 860 instances portfolio - 793 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
